turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I was looking to get a a beverage from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I was looking to get a caffè caffè mocha.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want it to be grand grande 2% milk with whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so your order is: a grande mocha with 2% milk and whipped cream, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to pick it up at the Starbucks on 31st & Downing.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks on 31st and dogeon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, thank you very much.
